GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article belonging to the id input into url

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments belonging to a specific article id, sorted from most recent comment first

comments.body: I am 100% sure that we're not completely sure.
comments.author: butter_bridge

comments.body: This is a bad article name
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to the comments database, with an article id matching to the article the comment belongs to

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article by its article id. takes an object which specifies amount of votes to be incremented by
